text: Renaissance is the sixth studio album by Lionel Richie. It was released on 16 October, 2000 through Island Def Jam. It went to number 3 in Germany, number 5 in Austria, number 6 in Switzerland, number 10 in the United Kingdom and the Netherlands, number 16 in Poland and number 62 in the United States. It received mixed reviews. ==Track listing== ;Notes * signifies a vocal producer * signifies a remixer * On some editions, the track "Don't You Ever Go Away" is replaced by "I Forgot". == References == Category:2000 albums Category:Lionel Richie
title: Renaissance (Lionel Richie album)
